ResumePage.Quote: The measure of a man is what he does with power
ResumePage.AboutMeDescription: Hello, I'm Furkan. I have been involved with technology from a young age and have a strong ability to adapt to modern technologies easily. I am proficient in technological infrastructure, computer hardware, and web development. Through various projects, I have gained experience that has helped me improve my problem-solving and analytical skills. My goal is to contribute to innovative projects in the technology field, fostering both my personal and professional growth.
